title: 52p Panoramic, Beachfront land for sale in Gandara, Matara
details: 52 perch, Freehold and clear title, beachfront land located in a cliff in Gandara, Matara is available for sale. Land has a wider beachfront and a lager reservation with a rock formation, including a natural pool in front of the property. Less than 1 km from Matara-Tangalle road.
